description: TEHRAN - In a crucial diplomatic meeting, Iran's Foreign Minister Abbas Araqchi held discussions with Jordan's King Abdullah II, emphasizing the urgent need for enhanced cooperation among Muslim nations to counter Israel's ongoing military actions.
title: Countering Israel's warmongering through active diplomacy

description: TEHRAN- Iranian director Marjan Khosravi’s “Requiem for a Tribe” will go on screen at the 28th edition of the Ji.hlava International Documentary Film Festival, which will be held in Jihlava, the Czech Republic, from October 25 to November 3.
title: Iran’s “Requiem for a Tribe” to compete at Ji.hlava film festival

description: TEHRAN-Speaking at the 6th World Media Summit in China, Mohammad Mahdi Rahmati, the CEO of Mehr Media Group (which consists of Mehr News Agency and English-language daily Tehran Times), emphasized the crucial role of people-to-people exchanges in the success of the Chinese Belt and Road Initiative.
title: People-to-people exchanges: a key to Belt and Road's success

description: TEHRAN- In a recent phone conversation, Iranian Minister of Culture and Islamic Guidance Seyyed Abbas Salehi addressed concerns regarding statements made by certain Turkish media officials that have caused disquiet among the public in Iran.
title: Iranian culture minister urges Turkey to avoid statements causing public discontent

description: TEHRAN-The 41st Tehran International Short Film Festival (TISFF) will kick off on October 18 at Mellat Cineplex in Tehran. One of the standout sections of this year’s festival is a special screening of four short and medium-length films by the renowned German filmmaker Wim Wenders, scheduled for Monday, October 21.
title: TISFF to screen 4 short films by Wim Wenders

description: LUCKNOW, India - Until now, thousands of children, women and aged people have been devoured by death and millions have been rendered homeless in the Gaza Strip. Should there now not even be a word of condolence for them?
title: Gaza and deep pain in my heart

description: TEHRAN- The United States has thrown its full political and military weight behind Israel since the regime launched war on Gaza more than a year ago.
title: Dubious diplomacy: US swords for Israeli protection, pediatric pills for Palestinian suffering

description: TEHRAN- Over the past two weeks, question marks have been raised about the targets of Israeli airstrikes in Lebanon.
title: Israeli motive behind deadly Lebanon strikes

description: TEHRAN- Israel is still reeling from the fallout of a drone attack carried out by Hezbollah against one of its military bases near the port city of Haifa at the weekend.
title: Humiliated by Hezbollah: Israel turns to industry to help foil drone attacks

description: TEHRAN – During a phone conversation with Oman's Sultan Haitham bin Tariq Al Said on Wednesday, Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian underscored the need for increased pressure on Israel's supporters to curb its aggression.
title: Pezeshkian urges Muslims to ‘act as one’ against Israel in call with Omani Sultan

description: TEHRAN – Behrouz Kamalvandi, spokesperson for the Atomic Energy Organization of Iran (AEOI), has dismissed Israeli threats against Iran's nuclear facilities, assuring the public that the country is prepared for any scenario.
title: ‘We are prepared for any scenario’: Iran addresses Israeli threats against nuclear sites

description: China and Iran formally defined their bilateral relations as Comprehensive Strategic Partnership (CSP) in early 2016, when President Xi Jinping paid a visit to Iran. The strategic relationship has seen robust development since then.
title: China-Iran Comprehensive Strategic Partnership will grow more important in a turbulent world

description: Tehran – Marking the one-year anniversary of the bombing of Al-Ahli Arab Hospital, Iran's Islamic Revolution Guard Corps (IRGC) has reaffirmed its commitment to supporting Palestinians in their struggle against the Israeli regime.
title: IRGC vows continued support for Palestinians on ann. of Israel’s strike of Al-Ahli Arab hospital

description: TEHRAN - In a note, Donya-e-Eqtesad discussed transformation in the Middle East after the 7th of October and wrote: After the October 7th attack the situation in the Middle East changed.
title: The illusion of a ‘new Middle East’

description: Al-Awda Hospital has been inundated with casualties as dozens of injured people continue to arrive daily, the acting director of the hospital says.
title: Northern Gaza hospital overwhelmed with casualties

description: The Israeli forces’ assault on Gaza has escalated to a “horrifying level of atrocity” as “northern Gaza is being wiped off the map,” dozens of prominent NGOs have said in a statement.
title: Israel escalates Gaza assault to ‘horrifying level’

description: TEHRAN – Iran's Foreign Minister Abbas Araghchi held phone conversations with both his French counterpart, Jean-Noel Barrot, and United Nations Secretary-General Antonio Guterres, expressing deep concern over Israel's ongoing aggression against Lebanon and Gaza.
title: Araqchi warns Israel's growing aggression risks unpredictable outcome

description: TEHRAN – The commander of the border guard in Iran's southeastern Sistan and Baluchestan province has vehemently denied reports originating from Western-funded media outlets that Iranian forces fired upon Afghan nationals.
title: Commander denies shooting incident on Iran-Afghanistan border

description: MADRID – In recent days, various Western and regional media outlets have raised questions regarding the whereabouts of Ismail Qaani, the head of the Iranian Revolution Guard Corps (IRGC) Quds Force.
title: Esmail Qaani: target of a Zionist disinformation campaign amid rising regional tensions

description: TEHRAN – Canberra has followed in the footsteps of the UK and EU, with the Australian Ministry of Foreign Affairs announcing sanctions against Iranian individuals associated with the country’s missile program.
title: Australia sanctions Iranian individuals linked to nation’s missile program

description: TEHRAN – The Iranian Defense Minister has described Washington’s recent provision of the Terminal High Altitude Area Defense (THAAD) system to Israel as a component of psychological warfare against Iran and the rest of the Axis of Resistance.
title: Iran DM says Israel’s deployment of American THAAT ‘psychological warfare’

description: TEHRAN – The chief of the Iranian parliamentary delegation to the Inter-Parliamentary Union (IPU) has denounced Western sanctions preventing Iran from accessing technologies and equipment for mine clearance.
title: Tehran slams Western sanctions obstructing transfer of mine clearance technology

description: TEHRAN – Deploying the THAAD system in the occupied lands operated by US personnel means Washington’s direct and more involvement in the regional tensions that can drive the region to wider confrontations and instability.
title: US THAAD deployment in WA; meaning, consequences

description: TEHRAN – A dangerous new chapter in the ongoing saga of West Asia tensions has unfolded, fuelled by a blatant display of Israeli aggression and the weaponization of misinformation.
title: The THAAD and the tall tale: real weapons and fake news

description: TEHRAN – Iran's interim charge d'affaires in Pyongyang has engaged in discussions with senior North Korean officials regarding recent events on the Korean Peninsula, as well as the ongoing violence perpetrated by the Israeli regime in Gaza and Lebanon.
title: Tehran, Pyongyang talk West Asia, Korean Peninsula tensions

description: TEHRAN - Tajikistan’s ambassador to Iran, Nizamuddin Zahedi, has said the cultural, linguistic, and historical commonalities between the two nations present valuable opportunities to expand bilateral cooperation.
title: Tajik envoy highlights shared heritage as key to cementing Tehran-Dushanbe ties

description: TEHRAN – The Minister of Cultural Heritage, Tourism, and Handicrafts, Seyyed Reza Salehi-Amiri, has called for the national registration of traditional Iranian wrestling, citing its deep cultural and historical significance.
title: Traditional wrestling in Iran set for national recognition, says minister

description: TEHRAN - Three ancient glazed bricks, dating back to c. 800 BC, have been returned to Iran, brought home by Iranian Parliament Speaker Mohammad-Baqer Qalibaf after his participation in the Inter-Parliamentary Union (IPU) Summit in Geneva.
title: Qalibaf brings prehistorical artifacts back to Iran following Geneva visit

description: TEHRAN - Iran is making strides toward securing a possible UNESCO recognition for its centuries-old Asbads, traditional vertical-axis windmills used for grain grinding, as it works to complete a dossier for their inclusion on the World Heritage list.
title: Iran moves closer to UNESCO recognition of windmills

description: TEHRAN – Iranian legendary karateka Zabihollah Poorshab announced retirement from the sport on Wednesday.
title: Iran’s Zabihollah Poorshab announces retirement from karate

description: TEHRAN –According to the latest statistics, education space per student in Iran has increased from 5.17 square meters in the calendar year 1396 (2017-2018) to 5.28 square meters in the year 1402 (2023 – 2024).
title: Education space per student, literacy rate improved

description: TEHRAN - Lionel Messi, the goal-scoring legend, surpassed Iran’s Ali Daei with his 110th goal for Argentina.
title: Messi surpasses Daei with 110th goal for Argentina

description: TEHRAN- TEDPIX, the main index of the Tehran Stock Exchange (TSE), fell 4,207 points to 2,084,153 on Wednesday, which is the fifth day of the Iranian calendar week.
title: TEDPIX falls 4,200 points on Wednesday

description: TEHRAN –Condemning Israeli attacks on Red Cross and Red Crescent medical facilities, Kate Forbes, President of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies (IFRC), has supported the Iranian Red Crescent Society’s efforts aimed at providing relief to oppressed people in Lebanon.
title: IFRC supports IRCS humanitarian measures in Lebanon

description: TEHRAN –An Iranian delegation led by Nader Yar-Ahmadi, an official with the National Organization for Migration, is participating in the 75th Annual Session of the Executive Committee of the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees (ExCom) being held from October 14 to 19 in Geneva, Switzerland.
title: Iran attending ExCom annual session

description: TEHRAN – Iran's men’s team defeated France 7-1 and Singapore 11-3 in Group F of the 2024 International Canoe Federation Canoe Polo World Championships on Wednesday.
title: Winning start for Iran’s men in 2024 ICF Canoe Polo World Championships

description: TEHRAN- Production of red meat in Iran rose three percent in the fifth month of the current Iranian calendar year (July 22-August 21), as compared to the previous month, the Statistical Center of Iran (SCI) announced.
title: Red meat production up 3% in a month

description: TEHRAN – The head of the Islamic Republic of Iran Railways (RAI) has emphasized the increase of academic interaction between Iran and Spain, and invited the technical experts of the Spanish railway field to transfer experience for launching high-speed trains in Iran.
title: RAI invites Spanish experts to partake in Iran’s railway projects

description: TEHRAN – Several small-scale power plants with a total capacity of 127 megawatts (MW) have come on stream across Iran since the beginning of the current Iranian calendar year (March 20), an official with the country’s Power Generation, Distribution and Transmission Company (TAVANIR) said.
title: Small-scale power plants with capacity of 127MW come on stream since late Mar.

description: TEHRAN – The head of Iran’s Trade Center in Ivory Coast has said the fifth Iran-Tanzania Joint Economic Committee meeting is due to be held from October 18 to 21 in Tanzania, IRIB reported.
title: 5th Iran-Tanzania Joint Economic Committee meeting to be held this week

description: TEHRAN - Iran's Oil Minister Mohsen Paknejad, in a meeting with the visiting Azerbaijani Deputy Prime Minister Shahin Mustafayev, called for the formation of a joint working group in order to pursue and accelerate bilateral cooperation, especially in the field of energy.
title: Iran determined to boost trade, energy co-op with Azerbaijan

description: TEHRAN - During the World Chambers Federation's first Europe and Asia Regional Summit in Turkey, the head and board members of Iran Chamber of Commerce, Industries, Mines, and Agriculture (ICCIMA) explored ways for boosting international cooperation.
title: ICCIMA seeking expansion of international cooperation
Beirut and Gunpowder Episode 05

description: ISLAMABAD - The world, especially the Islamic world, has been facing a difficult situation for a year in which the space for the cemetery in Gaza is getting less. However, the Israeli barbaric acts are going on unabated.
title: The victory of blood over the sword

description: TEHRAN – The FAO Representation in the Islamic Republic of Iran marked World Food Day and the International Day of Rural Women on Tuesday, October 15, with a keynote speech by Ms. Nazi Tavakoli, Officer-in-Charge, emphasizing the interconnectedness of food and nutrition security and the empowerment of rural women.
title: FAO highlights essential role of rural women in food production and environmental sustainability
Exclusive: South of Beirut engulfed in smoke

description: TEHRAN-The Iranian Mehr Media Group and Xinhua News Agency of China have inked a memorandum of understanding for cooperation in the field of media and information.
title: Mehr Media Group signs MoU with Xinhua News Agency
